channel.title: RSCLegends.net || JOIN NOW FUCKAZ~!
channel.description:
RSC-Legends! (www.rsclegends.net) - XP Rate: 100x - 2 WORLDS!!! F2p world and P2p world - Active 24/7, little to no downtime! - Firewall protected - DDoS attacks are ineffective! - Multiple training spots (MANY NPC's), very user-friendly! - 5 NPC's dedicated to selling items! (Runes, Arrows, Rune, and other armour!) - Great staff, very knowledgable and helpful. - Rune/Dragon dropped by red, blue, and black dragons! - Great dragon maze! - Has an "Adventurer" in multiple places in RSCL, it's a teleport NPC. - Unlimited respawn of potions, robes, klanks, etc.! - Multiple PK'ing spots! (Now 2 worlds, supports f2p and p2p PK'ing)
Don't believe us? Here's a few pictures! :)
The shopping area/Unlimited Item Respawn: [img]http://img360.imageshack.us/img360/3342/screenshot162dm6.png[/img]
NPC's: [img]http://img384.imageshack.us/img384/613/screenshot164pa0.png[/img] [img]http://img293.imageshack.us/img293/6152/screenshot165ie8.png[/img]
Our dragon maze: [img]http://img392.imageshack.us/img392/7615/screenshot166ah5.png[/img] [img]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/636/screenshot167sc8.png[/img]
Still in disbelief that we're the BEST, MOST SECURE server?! Here's some videos! -> P2p PK'ing: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qIBwD-P5URc -> F2p PK'ing: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_eydjD-jNLI
Join RSC-LEGENDS today! (www.rsclegends.net) [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] No thanks. Your title is pathetic, too.[/center]
